title: How to politely ask for an email - Quora

response.answer_text: Simply ask with a explanation for what you want and perhaps why. Everyone today is dubious of people who are not direct really. Allow for a dialogue with the person if you want help or suggestions people are busy but usually are flattered to be asked for help or for information. Keep in mind people have value so don’t ask for something of extreme value for nothing. Just be forth right and truthful. All the best!

Depends who it is - if it is a friend Dear “First Name” Could you send a summary of your thoughts to me by mail? Thank you so much Kind regards XXXX (your first name)  Formal: Dear Mr. / Mrs. “Last Name” Thank you for this interesting …. (discussion - phone call - chat - Skype - whatever it was - etc.) I would be delighted if you were so kind to send a summary, to my e-mail address - xxxxx@gmail.com [because …. (and your reason - you might also send without a reason)]. If you are a student - i would add the reason. And also that you would mention it in your master or whatever you write. They will feel VERY flattered or honored. Who does not wish to participate in such a work… Thank you (so) very much for your appreciated “feedback/summary” (-whatever you wish to enter here). Kind regards XXXX YYYYY (your full name)
